Invocations during Sujood.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (How perfect my Lord is, The Most High.’(three times))

Invocations during Sujood.ARABIC_TEXT: ((سُبْحَانَكَ اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّنَا وَبِحَمْدِكَ، اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي)).
Invocations during Sujood.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (How perfect You are O Allah, our Lord, and I praise You. O Allah, forgive me.)
(Perfect and Holy (He is), Lord of the angles and the Rooh (i.e. Jibra-eel).)

Invocations during Sujood.ARABIC_TEXT: ((اللَّهُمَّ لَكَ سَجَدْتُ وَبِكَ آمَنْتُ، وَلَكَ أَسْلَمْتُ، سَجَدَ وَجْهِيَ لِلَّذِي خَلَقَهُ، وَصَوَّرَهُ، وَشَقَّ سَمْعَهُ وَبَصَرَهُ، تَبَارَكَ اللَّهُ أَحْسنُ الْخَالِقينَ)).
Invocations during Sujood.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (Allahumma laka sajadt, wabika amant, walaka aslamt, sajada wajhee lillathee khalaqahu wasawwarahu washaqqa samAAahu wabasarahu, tabarakal-lahu ahsanul-khaliqeen.)
Invocations during Sujood.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (O Allah, unto You I have prostrated and in You I have believed, and unto You I have submitted. My face has prostrated before He Who created it and fashioned it, and brought forth its faculties of hearing and seeing. Blessed is Allah, the Best of creators.)
(How perfect He is, The Possessor of total power, sovereignty, magnificence and grandeur.)

Invocations during Sujood.ARABIC_TEXT: ((اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي ذَنْبِي كُلَّهُ: دِقَّهُ وَجِلَّهُ، وَأَوَّلَهُ وَآخِرَهُ، وَعَلاَنِيَّتَهُ وَسِرَّهُ)).
Invocations during Sujood.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (Allahummagh-fir lee thanbee kullah, diqqahu wajillah, wa-awwalahu wa-akhirah, wa- AAalaniyyatahu wa-sirrah.)
Invocations during Sujood.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (O Allah, forgive me all of my sins, the small and great of them, the first and last of them, and the seen and hidden of them.)

Invocations during Sujood.ARABIC_TEXT: ((اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِرِضَاكَ مِنْ سَخَطِكَ، وَبِمُعَافَاتِكَ مِنْ عُقوبَتِكَ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْكَ، لاَ أُحْصِي ثَنَاءً عَلَيْكَ، أَنْتَ كَمَا أَثْنَيْتَ عَلَى نَفْسِكَ)).
Invocations during Sujood.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (Allahumma innee aAAoothu biridaka min sakhatik, wa-bimuAAafatika min AAuqoobatik, wa-aAAoothu bika mink, la ohsee thana-an AAalayk, anta kama athnayta AAala nafsik.)
Invocations during Sujood.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (O Allah, I take refuge within Your pleasure from Your displeasure and within Your pardon from Your punishment, and I take refuge in You from You. I cannot enumerate Your praise, You are as You have praised Yourself.)
